short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store and manage email addresses for quick access

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📧 Email Clipboard Manager - Simplify Your Email Management!
Easily manage, copy, and save email addresses with the ultimate productivity tool for email handling.

🛠️ Key Features:

Add & Save Email Addresses: Quickly input and save email addresses directly into the extension.
One-Click Copy: Copy email addresses to your clipboard with a single click—perfect for fast-paced tasks.
Editable Input: Enter new addresses with ease, and save only when ready.
Smart Validation: Ensures every email entered meets formatting standards for accuracy.
Storage Integration: Automatically saves your email list securely in Chrome's local storage for quick access anytime.
Delete with Ease: Remove unwanted emails in a snap for a clutter-free experience.
💼 Perfect For:

Professionals managing multiple email addresses.
Sales reps juggling leads and contacts.
Anyone who needs quick access to frequently used emails.
🔒 Privacy First: Your data stays local—stored securely in your browser without sharing it online.

📥 Download now and elevate your email workflow today!
